PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-05802019-05-21,  ,  ,  ,  ,  VAC
ActDepartment of Veterans Affairs Act
SubjectOrder Assigning to the Minister of Veterans Affairs the power to develop, establish and implement a transfer payment program, the Métis Veterans Recognition Payment
PrecisOrder Assigning to the Minister of Veterans Affairs the power to develop, establish and implement a transfer payment program, the Métis Veterans Recognition Payment in order to (1) recognize Second World War Métis Veterans' pre- and post-war experiences that may have negatively affected their re-establishment in civil life, through the provision of a $20,000 individual recognition payment to each eligible Second World War Métis Veteran or their survivor; and (2) support commemorative initiatives that promote awareness and appreciation of Métis Veterans' sacrifices and contributions among the Métis people and the Canadian public.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
